alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:23AM CDT until September 24 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 722 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenwood, or near Shreveport, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Stonewall, Fosters, Keachi, Grand Cane, Longstreet, Keat Chie, Spring Ridge, Cross Lake, Kingston, Ninock, Kickapoo, Keithville, Mc Dade, Reeds Store, and Gloster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River
